long_description: The women's Salomon Rhythm snowboard bindings offer up a surf/skate feel and plenty of power for your all-mountain endeavors. Bindings provide side-to-side motion for tweaking out grabs without losing highback support for edge control. Highbacks are designed to fit women's calves; they are lightweight, supportive and flexible, and still deliver power and drive for digging in deep. EVA padding provides power transfer from feet to board without sacrificing control or feel. Reinforced heel loops ensure a consistent flex; soft heel cups enhance skate-feel lateral flex and mobility. Ankle straps feature an ergonomic skeleton on the inside and lightweight cushy foam on the outside. Toe straps on the Salomon Rhythm snowboard bindings fit over the tops or over the toes of your boots; plus, they open and close easily. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Salomon Rhythm snowboard bindings offer up a surf/skate feel and plenty of power for your all-mountain endeavors.
